verses.roman:
āra dina mahāprabhu bhaṭṭācāryera saṅge
jagannātha daraśana kaila mahā-raṅge

synonyms: āra dina—the next day; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; bhaṭṭācāryera saṅge—with Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; jagannātha—of Lord Jagannātha; daraśana—visiting the temple; kaila—did; mahā-raṅge—with great enthusiasm.
translation: The next day Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu arrived and went with Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya, with great enthusiasm, to see the temple of Lord Jagannātha.
